title: Ayebabara
author: Ayebabara
created_time: July 16, 2023, 06:22:35 PMLast edit: July 17, 2023, 06:20:07 AM by Ayebabara
content: Almost everyone in the forum loves the bull market than the bear market though it has not scientifically proven but people love the bull market more than the bear market, and upon known this, there are some people who are interested in the bear market because they are using the bear to accumulate and store their wallets with enough bitcoins so I decided to know the opinion of the forum users. Among the two which of them do you prefer, is it the bull market or the Bear Market? And why? Some are investing for the bull market  and once the bull market comes they offload the wallet. While.some are perpetual in the holding both in the bull and the bear. So where do you belong? Is the bull market is more important than the bear market? And if I may ask, which one is the best?

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Typically everyone will be happier when the value of the asset they hold increase tremendously and they can pull out 10× profits from their initial investment or more. The bear market is a means to profit from the bull market, a means to an end.Both are important factors in any market to ensure there is a balance, any asset that has constant growth over very extended periods of time will draw skepticism from investors.Quote from: Ayebabara on July 16, 2023, 06:22:35 PMSome are investing for the bull market  and once the bull market comes they offload the wallet. While.some are perpetual in the holding both in the bull and the bear. So where do you belong?I am more of a hodl guy, through the different markets.If you know what you're doing, you can short Bitcoin when the price rises and drops to get more. If you do not know what you're doing just hold till you reach your desired profits.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Just like how sun and moon are both important for the universe to operate, similarly both Bull market and Bear market are a necessary part of the Bitcoin ecosystem.Bear markets allows new investors to jump in the market and buy their favorite altcoin or Bitcoin at a discounted price.Bull market shows the potential of the Cryptoverse and great returns those who trusted the market in bear run. They get rewarded for their patience.It's a complete cycle and I love it.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Both the bull market and the bear market are very important because in an investment there must be a time when you have the opportunity to make profit,you just have to take that profit and still have your investment running. Someone who has zeal to hodli his bitcoin will love the bear market more than the bull run because it is an advantage for them to accumulate more bitcoin to their investment portfolio. And those who have invested to sell off during the bull run will always be eager for the bull run to come. But the fact with bitcoin investment is that you need to buy during the bear because that is when people who don't have much on them can use the opportunity to invest in bitcoin. I prefer the bear market more than the bull since I want more bitcoin than making profit.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: There's no need for any scientifical explanation why people like to see the bull market. It's because we want to see our portfolios grow. And opposite at the same time for those that haven't accumulated yet. There's really no need to shred it into parts why people prefer this or that.Quote from: Ayebabara on July 16, 2023, 06:22:35 PMSo where do you belong? Is the bull market is more important than the bear market? And if I may ask, which one is the best?Both of them are important that makes the market go round. You just go with the flow and take any opportunity and advantage that it offers.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Ayebabara on July 16, 2023, 06:22:35 PMAlmost everyome in the forum loves the bull market than the bear market though it has not scientifically proven but people love the bull market more than the bear market, and upon known this, there are some people who are interested in the bear market because they are using the bear to accumulate and store their wallets with enough bitcoins so I decided to know the opinion of the forum users. While.some are perpetual in the holding both in the bull and the bear. So where do you belong? Is the bull market is more important than the bear market? And if I may ask, which one is the best?Every investor or trader will always want to buy goods at a cheap price and sell them at a high price. The bear market is a time to buy at a cheap rate, while the bull run is a  time to sell and make a profit. Both of them are very important to make the market balanced. Each of the sessions serves as an opportunity or threat to different people. Some persons might make a profit when they sell above their buying price, while others loose because thy sell below the cost price because of FUD or other issues. To answer your question I will love to accumulate when the price is low and sell during the bull run, so I prefer both.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: The current market conditions are not favorable for a strong entry into a bull market. The chart shows a gradual decline, indicating a potential bear market before a bull market emerges. We have been experiencing a bull market for a few months now, starting when Bitcoin began surging from the $16,000 range. However, the present circumstances suggest a shift towards a bear market. It is likely that we may witness Bitcoin dropping below the $28,000 range before a bullish trend takes shape. Although the chances are slim, I have a hopeful vision of accumulating Bitcoin below $22,000, although I am uncertain if this scenario will become a reality.

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: As an investor, I'd say that I prefer the bull run better than the bear market. Gives me more opportunities to grow my portfolio, saves me from problems as most cryptocurrencies in the market are going upwards during those periods, and there are an abundance of profit in the industry, you just need to find the right tokens to take up. However, as someone who have built and developed stuff for this industry, I say that if you're building or developing something, it's best to do so during the bear market. There's no pressure to release it right away, leading to your project coming up as best as it can be, lower fees and you pretty much have all the time in the world cause you're in no rush. Plus, you have the opportunity to release your project soon as the bull run arrives, which gives you the prime leverage to pick up funding and all that important stuff. I say that these two periods in the industry are beneficial to different groups of people, having experienced both, I don't particularly prefer one over the other, but for all its worth it's really nice getting money so I'd choose bull over bear.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Ayebabara on July 16, 2023, 06:22:35 PM Some are investing for the bull market  and once the bull market comes they offload the wallet. While.some are perpetual in the holding both in the bull and the bear. So where do you belong? Is the bull market is more important than the bear market? And if I may ask, which one is the best?The bull market and bear market are seasons in the crypto market, it is normal for these seasons to come and go, Neither is more important than the other and traders do their best to take advantage of both periods of the market. One major difference is the way traders react to the changes in the market, most people are unhappy when the market crashes, and they get excited when there is a bull run because they are making profits. As we know, the bear market is the best time to buy low and hodl to sell high at a later date but still people are not happy when it’s bear market.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Who don't love to see their portfolio is pumping like a rocket? Some people like bear market but their intention is to see the next bull market. If you see the scenario between bull and bear market you will see mostly people like to invest more in Bull season and they unfortunately sell by being panicked in the bear market. But the right decision should be entering in Bear season and grab profits in Bull season. In Bear season it's the perfect time to buy but they just feel unsafe and predict a huge crash in the market. That's some of them can't make a right decision.In short I obviously prefer Bull market to grab profits and Bear market to accumulate more. Between them I would like to choose Bull market because it realize us how much potential Bitcoin is.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well funny enough I would say every time is important to Bitcoin, the Bear Market, bull run they both play an important role in the crypto-currency ecosystem. Firstly I would say many people would be looking for the bear market to come in so as to be able to accumulate more Bitcoin, when the price is cheaper people have the opportunity to get more and as all investor would want to get more  profits from their investment they would want the bull run to come next, so they are both very important.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Hmm, What kind of question is this? in OP's Tittle as both had their own importance for the investor as without a Bear market you cant accumulate, and without a Bull market you cant book profits on the accumulation. So both are equally important this Question is like Water Vs Oxygen, Which will you prefer Obviously both have their own importance and role so both are required.Besides leaving the Basic question yes if I have already done with accumulation I will prefer the Bull market and those who are entering the market will prefer the Bear one because they want to fill up most of the bags cheaply.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: I don't like bear market but I do buy whenever the market is on that phase. Most newbies don't like bear market as well because they're all discouraged to hold by that time because the mindset they've got is that the entire market is about to collapse.I'm a bullish person so the choice is obvious but I guess this topic is just all for the sake of arguing why someone has to be bullish or bearish and OP has already answered it.

comments.author: usekevin
comments.body: The good traders use both as a chance then blame it.Because bear run is wonderful chance to buy at cheap price, where the bull run is enough to make a good profit in a short time.Only the new people not easy to find the correct time to buy the bitcoin Or sell.The panic selling is the biggest problem of the new traders.When the market is started to reduce some value due to the market crash,the panic people sell their valuable coins at low price.They need to analysis the market well as comparing to old charts.

comments.body: Quote from: Ayebabara on July 16, 2023, 06:22:35 PMAlmost everyome in the forum loves the bull market than the bear market though it has not scientifically proven but people love the bull market more than the bear market, and upon known this, there are some people who are interested in the bear market because they are using the bear to accumulate and store their wallets with enough bitcoins so I decided to know the opinion of the forum users. Those are the true Bitcoin investors since they believe in Bitcoin and have the feeling that they will never lose their money owing to their trust in the entire Bitcoin process, whilst others are only interested in making a profit for short-term investments.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: Mr.suevie on July 16, 2023, 08:16:05 PMYou are very correct on this thought because the bull and both bear have their specific purposes in an investment but if am not wrong the bear market would be loved by mostly new time investors who have missed out from when bitcoin was very low because the bear is the period where they can have that opportunity once more to accumulate and add to their bitcoin investment portfolio.You’re right it is those that have actually been in the market but without experience that fear bear markets. Most of these people that fear bear markets have either invested with money they can’t afford to lose or have either set a time target to pull out the funds and not necessarily pulling out on a price target. If you look at the d traders or probably the experienced ones they actually love both options mostly the bear market. They can decide to take profits during the bull period and then accumulate more on the bear period. As for those longtime investors like those saving for retirement, they love the market red so that they can accumulate more. It is a mixed thing it actually depends on your own stance

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Bull vs Bear market and basic characteristics of the Bitcoin market and at its impact on individuals is depending on the financial position of the individual and as a cryptocurrency investor or market speculator what becomes our position is what asset we are holding at every market position in the sense that.Those who have all the money in Bitcoin and are holding large Bitcoin Units will always prefer the bull market because the bull market is the market condition that will yield them the desired profits, but those who have their funds in fiat currency and want to buy some Bitcoin will always prefer the market to ve in the bear season before opening their own position.So for that, we have to apply the market to individuals standing positions at every point in time, so it is hard to make a stand on this topic since both play a significant role in our investment life.

comments.author: imamusma
comments.body: Quote from: Ayebabara on July 16, 2023, 06:22:35 PMSo where do you belong? Is the bull market is more important than the bear market? And if I may ask, which one is the best?There are cycles that you can actually take advantage of to accumulate bitcoins and get out of your investment positions. The bearish phase experienced by bitcoin is a good time to accumulate, while you can sell it during the bullish phase. Both of these cycles are expected by investors, of course because they will never be on one road forever without stopping and getting out.A bull market is important for whoever you are to be able to sell your investment and make a profit, but a bear market is expected by those who start to reorganize their investment plans when bitcoin is about to be in its next bullish cycle.
